Texto: 
holter monitor reviewed:
3 ventricular ectopic beats
7 supraventricular ectopic beats
7 single premature atrial contractions
3 premature ventricular contractions
follow up with primary care physician.
• common ostium and short common trunk of left sided pulmonary veins.
• moderately dilated left atrium.
• no la or atrial appendage thrombus.
• normal lv size and function.
atrial septal defect; migraine headache
65 year old man presents with a persistent right-sided headache, described as "sinus" in nature.  he has a history of paroxysmal atrial fibrillation, deep venous thrombosis, and pulmonary embolism.
